verses.text: \w Blessed|strong="H0835"\w* \add is he whose\add* \w transgression|strong="H6588"\w* \add is\add* \w forgiven|strong="H5375"\w*, \add whose\add* \w sin|strong="H2401"\w* \add is\add* \w covered|strong="H3680"\w*.\f + \fr 32.1 \ft A Psalm…: or, A Psalm of David giving instruction\f*

\w Blessed|strong="H0835"\w* \add is\add* the \w man|strong="H0120"\w* unto whom the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w imputeth|strong="H2803"\w* not \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w*, and in whose \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* \add there is\add* no \w guile|strong="H7423"\w*.
When I kept \w silence|strong="H2790"\w*, my \w bones|strong="H6106"\w* waxed \w old|strong="H1086"\w* through my \w roaring|strong="H7581"\w* all the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* long.

For \w day|strong="H3119"\w* and \w night|strong="H3915"\w* thy \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* was \w heavy|strong="H3513"\w* upon me: my \w moisture|strong="H3955"\w* is \w turned|strong="H2015"\w* into the \w drought|strong="H2725"\w* of \w summer|strong="H7019"\w*. \w Selah|strong="H5542"\w*.

I \w acknowledged|strong="H3045"\w* my \w sin|strong="H2403"\w* unto thee, and mine \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w* have I not \w hid|strong="H3680"\w*. I \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, I will \w confess|strong="H3034"\w* my \w transgressions|strong="H6588"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; and thou \w forgavest|strong="H5375"\w* the \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w* of my \w sin|strong="H2403"\w*. \w Selah|strong="H5542"\w*.

For this shall every one that is \w godly|strong="H2623"\w* \w pray|strong="H6419"\w* unto thee in a \w time|strong="H6256"\w* when thou mayest be \w found|strong="H4672"\w*: surely in the \w floods|strong="H7858"\w* of \w great|strong="H7227"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* they shall not come \w nigh|strong="H5060"\w* unto him.\f + \fr 32.6 \ft when…: Heb. of finding\f*

Thou \add art\add* my hiding \w place|strong="H5643"\w*; thou shalt \w preserve|strong="H5341"\w* me from \w trouble|strong="H6862"\w*; thou shalt \w compass|strong="H5437"\w* me about with \w songs|strong="H7438"\w* of \w deliverance|strong="H6405"\w*. \w Selah|strong="H5542"\w*.

I will \w instruct|strong="H7919"\w* thee and \w teach|strong="H3384"\w* thee in the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* \w which|strong="H2098"\w* thou shalt \w go|strong="H3212"\w*: I will \w guide|strong="H3289"\w* thee with mine \w eye|strong="H5869"\w*.\f + \fr 32.8 \ft guide…: Heb. counsel thee, mine eye shall be upon thee\f*

Be ye not as the \w horse|strong="H5483"\w*, \add or\add* as the \w mule|strong="H6505"\w*, \add which\add* have no \w understanding|strong="H0995"\w*: whose \w mouth|strong="H5716"\w* must be \w held|strong="H1102"\w* in with \w bit|strong="H4964"\w* and \w bridle|strong="H7448"\w*, \w lest|strong="H1077"\w* they come \w near|strong="H7126"\w* unto thee.

\w Many|strong="H7227"\w* \w sorrows|strong="H4341"\w* \add shall be\add* to the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w*: but he that \w trusteth|strong="H0982"\w* in the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \w mercy|strong="H2617"\w* shall \w compass|strong="H5437"\w* him about.

Be \w glad|strong="H8055"\w* in the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and \w rejoice|strong="H1523"\w*, ye \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w*: and \w shout|strong="H7442"\w* for joy, all \add ye that are\add* \w upright|strong="H3477"\w* in \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*.
